title: GAX Axiom Verification Test Schema
description: Defines structured test cases to verify the correct functioning and non-regression of a defined Axiom.

testId.description: Unique immutable identifier for this test suite (e.g., 'TEST-AXIOM-0042').

axiomId.description: Reference to the axiom being tested.

axiomVersion.description: The specific version of the axiom definition being tested.

testCases.description: List of individual tests for validation.

testType.description: Defines whether the test expects the condition to be met, missed, or a transformation to occur.

inputContext.description: The code snippet, JSON blob, or system state that acts as input for the axiom evaluation.

expectedOutcome.description: The expected result, including match status and resulting action payload.

matches.description: True if the condition must fire.

transformedOutputHash.description: Required if testType is MUTATION_VERIFICATION. Hash of the expected post-mutation output.
